comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Nadejda Mikhailovna Mountbatten, Marchioness of Milford Haven (28 March 1896 – 22 January 1963) was the second daughter of Grand Duke Michael Mikhailovich of Russia and his morganatic wife Countess Sophie of Merenberg. She was a younger sister of Anastasia de Torby. Note correct spelling "Torby". Anastasia, a.k.a. Zia: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5853177284/in/photostream/] The parents: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3681838057/]

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: trialsanderrors, thanks for the corrected spelling and full name. We will update our records.
